XIII.i.8.A.2.d
.
Payment of the Accrued Clothing Allowance
If a rating decision or evidence in the claims folder at the date of death indicates that the Veteran met the eligibility requirements as of the August 1
st
date prior to death, then the lump sum clothing allowance is due and payable.
Note
:  The full lump sum is payable without
pro rata
accumulation for any portion of a year.
Reference
:  For more information on payment of accrued benefits, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3
.
